methods.name: setDefaultValue
methods.comment: Associates a default value with the given register over the given range.

params.name: registerValue
params.comment: the register for which to associate a default value.

methods.name: getDefaultValue
methods.comment: Returns the default value of a register at a given address.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get a default value.

params.name: address
params.comment: the address at which to get a default value.

return.comment:
the default value of the register at the given address or null if no default value
 has been assigned.
